definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Draw a square, and then cross the two diagonals.
sentences.chinese: 畫一個正方形，然後畫兩條對角線。

sentences.english: You can rotate your square by defining how you draw your object.
sentences.chinese: 您可以通過定義對象的繪製方式來旋轉您的正方形。

sentences.english: Thangkas are usually rectangular in shape, and the square ones are reserved for mandalas.
sentences.chinese: 唐卡通常是長方形的，正方形的被留到壇城使用。

sentences.english: The Norwegian Elkhound is a square and athletic member of the northern dog family.
sentences.chinese: 挪威獵麋鹿犬是一種正方形比例，運動型的北方狗。

sentences.english: For example, a square plate with four edges simply supported and clamped have been calculated and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 以四邊簡支和平夾的正方形板爲例進行了計算和分析。

sentences.english: There is a square table in the middle of the square room.
sentences.chinese: 正方形的房子中間有張方桌。

sentences.english: To calculate the area of a square double the length of one side.
sentences.chinese: 要計算正方形的面積，只需用邊長自乘即可。

sentences.english: The grid lines then form a network of squares .
sentences.chinese: 這樣網格線就形成了正方形網格。

sentences.english: A square has four 90-degree angles made by its four perpendicular sides.
sentences.chinese: 正方形的四個直角是由它四條垂直的邊所作成的。

sentences.english: A square has four 90-degree angles made by its four perpendicular sides.
sentences.chinese: 正方形的四個直角由它四條垂直的邊所構成。

sentences.english: A square has four sides but a circle has no sides.
sentences.chinese: 正方形有四條邊，而圓形沒有邊。
正方形是四邊形的一種。

sentences.english: Underneath each square was a color representing a prize.
sentences.chinese: 每個正方形下面都有一種顏色，代表一個獎品。

sentences.english: Each angle of a square is 90'.
Then, pop back to the original matrix and draw the gray square.
sentences.chinese: 然後，取出原始矩陣並繪製一個灰色正方形。

sentences.english: Alternatively, the touch screen can be used to select a square.
sentences.chinese: 二者擇一地，觸覺熒屏能用來選擇一個正方形。
